Moreover, they consider it good value for money, with one customer noting it doesn't feel cheap. However, the length receives mixed feedback - while some find it great, others say it's too long. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress for a formal occasion
items.body: This elegant mermaid gown was just that, elegant! it was beautifully made! It fit me perfectly, like a glove. the only thing is it was just a touch too short for me. i am 5'11" and weith 130 pounds. i purchased the small. like i said, it fit perfectly but for the length. the fabric was quality, not cheap, especially considering the price point. Read more
items.author: PS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress
items.body: Beautiful dress love the color fits great. Just as described shipping great came on time Iâ€™m 5 7 210lbs and the xxl fits great with room to move but clings in all the right places. Very comfortable and the material is a good thickness i ordered green ( which is like an emerald color) Read more
items.author: Rachel S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress
items.body: I bought this dress for a wedding back in march and got so many complements on it. The fabric is very forgiving and stretchy without being too stretchy. I was able to dance all night with easy. It's light weight but not see through or too heavy. Its a great dress because you can dress it up or down depending on accessories. I'm 5'4 and 150lbs and the medium fit like a glove. The length was a little long but with a pair of 1.5 inch heels it was perfect. Read more
items.author: Colleen

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress and good price.
items.body: Let me begin by saying that ANY dress (especially occasion dresses) will look a bit different in-person versus online because the majority of these models are around a size 2, so the images we see when purchasing the items will not translate the same on larger, more voluptuous body types. The dress may be gorgeous, but that doesn't mean it will flatter everyone. Having said that, let me get into this particular dress review... This dress is indeed gorgeous and I do feel that the style complements me! My measurements are 36-31-41 and I''m 5'9'' tall, and the size L fit nicely. For those measurements, I wouldn't go any smaller, but one size up would probably work okay too if you want a slightly roomier fit. It stretched just enough that I could pull it over my hips and sit comfortably in it. The off-white is very close to white, although it isn't stark and has a bit of a warmer tint to it. My biggest issue is that the draping on the chest didn't really hang the way I was hoping, even after moving it around several different ways. I'm wider in the shoulder area and am wondering if that's why, but even so, it doesn't have the "cowl-neck" look I wanted, so I opted to send it back. Overall I do like the dress style and fit, but since I can get a similar dress elsewhere I'd rather do so instead of settling for this one. Read more
items.author: Tonia Henry

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Trust me, you will look stunning.
items.body: This dress is absolutely gorgeous! So very elegant and truly vintage style. Very soft and comfortable. I have lost over 100 lbs. over the past 5 years and this dress is very form fitting and it makes me look even better! The stitch quality is fantastic! Fresh out of the box and bag there was zero scents. This is my wedding dress and I am so excited to see his reaction once he sees me wearing this. Read more
items.author: Elma Fullington

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸ Stunning, Timeless, and Flattering!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I bought the MUXXN Womenâ€™s 30s Brief Elegant Mermaid Sleeveless Gown for a formal event, and it exceeded every expectation. The cut is absolutely beautifulâ€”very figure-flattering without being restrictive, and the fabric has just the right amount of stretch to move comfortably while still looking structured. The mermaid silhouette gives it such a classy, Old Hollywood vibe. I received so many compliments and felt confident all night. The quality is impressive for the priceâ€”the stitching is neat, the material feels durable, and it looks much more expensive than it is. Sizing was true to size for me (I went with my usual dress size). If youâ€™re between sizes or prefer a little extra room, Iâ€™d suggest sizing up since the fit is tailored. Overall, this is one of those versatile gowns you could wear to a wedding, gala, or evening dinner and always look elegant. Iâ€™ll definitely be ordering it in another color! Read more
items.author: StyledWithPaws

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but with caution
items.body: Donâ€™t get me wrong, the dress is pretty. So much that Iâ€™m going to exchange for another one. What I got delivered is definitely worn already. It looks like someone put glue on some of the seams and it has stains on the inside. Why is there not more quality control on returns?! I ordered a size medium and itâ€™s on the tight side. Iâ€™m 5â€™5 and 135 lbs. Iâ€™m on the slim side, but any extra weight goes straight to my belly. Dress is very form fitting, but for me having my weight gain in the midsection, Iâ€™m hoping sizing up to a large that will give more looseness to where my belly button isnâ€™t showing straight through and I do t look 3 months pregnant ðŸ¥´. One more try and if the results are the same then Iâ€™m done with this dress. Itâ€™s a beautiful dress but Iâ€™d be careful to say getting it last minute for an occasion and counting on it , it might be a big let down Read more
items.author: Shopitup

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress
items.body: Close fit but very beautiful color and dress very comfortable, quality is very nice and not cheap looking for material Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Formal Sleeveless Mermaid is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Formal Sleeveless Mermaid is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Golden Brown, Hot Red, Blue, Burgundy, Black, Champagne, Dark Green, Off-white, Purple, Light Pink, Purple Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
